alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:04AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cass and western Crow Wing Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 604 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Park Rapids, to 7 miles east of Huntersville, to near Leader, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brainerd, Baxter, Pequot Lakes, Nisswa, Pine River, Pillager, Hackensack, Backus, Poplar, Leader, Gull Lake, South Long Lake, Sylvan, Lake Shore, East Gull Lake, Oshawa, Jenkins, Ten Mile Lake, Chickamaw Beach, and Legionville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass
